medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain worse after eating fatty meals.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started 3 days ago after eating pork chops and resolved overnight. The following day, after consuming steak and fries, the pain returned but improved overnight. It recurred after having pizza the next day and persisted, prompting the patient to seek medical attention. Additional symptoms include subjective fevers, chills, and nausea, with no changes in bowel habits. The patient has experienced similar episodes of pain after meals in the past.
